scene_description_enriched: The Virgin Mary, seated on a throne, nurses the Christ Child. She is surrounded by four angels. Two angels on the left play harps, one larger and one smaller. Two angels on the right play a tambourine and a lute, respectively. The scene is set outdoors with a green landscape and trees under a blue sky. Above the Virgin and Child is an ornate golden canopy with intricate tracery. The entire scene is framed by a decorative border with floral motifs.
